title: "Thinking Through the Ethics of New Tech…Before There’s a Problem"
excerpt: "There’s a familiar pattern when a new technology is introduced: It grows rapidly, comes to permeate our lives, and only then does society begin to see and address the problems it creates. But is it possible to head off possible problems?"
